long_description: With a quality Cree XM-L LED and a selector ring that lets you rapidly choose any light output from 0.1 lumen to 750 lumens, the Nitecore SRT5 Flashlight is ideal for everyday use and trips outdoors. Cree XM-L LED throws a beam a distance of 155m (509 ft.) to illuminate the darkest trails and dark streets. 4 "brightness" levels: turbo, low, red LED and blue LED plus dimmer that allows you to select any light level. Rotate the selector ring to rapidly choose any level of output from 0.1 lumen to 750 lumens, and to select strobe modes, turbo output, low output and different colored LEDs. Operates on either one 18650 lithium-ion battery or two CR123 lithium batteries (sold separately) to provide up to 450 hrs. of runtime on the lowest output level. Equipped with red and blue LEDs that are useful for signaling; red light is also useful for general outdoor use when you don't want to ruin your night vision. Includes a standard strobe mode and a police warning light that alternates red and blue light; leave the flashlight in location beacon strobe mode to find it easily at night. Aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and a stainless-steel retaining ring protect the core components from damage. Includes a titanium-plated stainless-steel clip for attaching the light to a belt or pant pocket. The Nitecore SRT5 flashlight has an IPX8 water resistance rating for submersion to 2m; impact resistant to 1.5m. Includes a holster, removable clip, lanyard, spare tail-cap button and spare O-ring.
short_description: With a quality Cree XM-L LED and a selector ring that lets you rapidly choose any light output from 0.1 lumen to 750 lumens, the Nitecore SRT5 Flashlight is ideal for everyday use and trips outdoors.
